doc.field: county streets: Hanover County GIS datasets (datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab by the Hanover County GIS Office of the County of Hanover, Virginia, USA, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the infrastructure, service zones, and land use within Hanover County as well as related natural features. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally in the 2001-2004 range, but some datasets may include data that originated earlier (ex. topography from 1997). * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * County and District Boundaries * Ashland District Boundary * Buildings and Structures (footprints only) * County Streets (centerlines) - incl. street name and additional geocoding/address-matching info. * Road Edges and Smaller (private) Roads * Right-Of-Way Easements *Address locations (points) * Parcels (polygon shape) - incl. parcel#, address, owner, assessments. * Parcels (data tables) - incl. parcel#, address, owner, permits, assessments, school and voting precinct info. * Easements * Fences * Zoning - incl. zoning codes. * Conditional Use Permit Areas - incl. permit #s. * Elevation Contours - 5 ft. amsl contours. * Tree and Forest Canopy Cover edges * Water features * Major Utility Lines and Pipelines * Hickory Hill Development - incl. parcel ids, owners, permit info, addresses, assessments, admin and precinct info. * Unnamed Development - incl. parcel ids, permit info, acreage. * // * Additional Metadata and Parcel data tables can be found via the "extra resources" UVA link provided. * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
